ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Li battery; Video-in terminal and DC power supply. It is easy to hold and do not need complicated equipment that hinders the inspecting and repairing. High image resolution monitor enable to show clear image Long work time.
Equips with Li-ion battery of high capability. Each 4 hours recharge durables 6~7 work hours. Humanized design of appearance.
Hand-hold design for professionals. Easy operation without taking off gloves speeds your works. Support DC power for camera.
It's convenient for user to check camera condition and correct direction of camera, so to make installation and repairing easier.
Package included: 1 x Camera Detector, 1 x Transformer, 1 x CCD power cord, 1 x 3.7V 1400mA li-ion battery, 1 x Lanyard, 1 x Users manual
ProductInfo.Name: 2.5 inch TFT LCD Monitor Handheld Surveillance CCTV Camera Tester Detector 12V Output
